移動式近海鑽探裝置建造及設備章程: MODU CODE {Code for the Construction and Equipment of Mobile Offshore Drilling Units}

每公分俯仰差力矩: moment to change trim one cm {=MTC}

每吋俯仰差力矩: moment to change trim one inch {=MTI}

直流單線船體負極回路系統: negative hull return DC single system

油浴艉軸管軸承: oil bath type stern tube bearing

洩油監控系統: oil discharge monitoring and control system

截錐頭粗頸鉚釘: pan head and swell neck rivet

截錐頭直頸鉚釘: pan head with parallel neck rivet

高速船營運許可證: Permit to operate high speed craft

高速斷續開關: quick make and break type switch

海水潤滑艉軸管軸承: sea water lubricated stern tube bearing

消音兼風量控制箱: sound attenuation and air volume control box

魷竿釣漁船: squid pole and line fishing boat

小水線面氣墊船: SWAACS {Small Waterplane Area Air Cushion Ship}

小水線面雙體船: SWATH {Small Waterplane Area Twin Hull Ship}

最接近點時間: TCPA {time to closest point of approach}
time to closest point of approach  {= TCPA}

全封閉可攜式貨燈: totally enclosed portable type cargo light

輔機單元組合安裝: unit assembly and installation of auxiliary
